ygData.subject: Re: Charming wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: You then, of course, charmed the other wisp, right?
ygData.messageBody:
You then, of course, charmed the other wisp, right?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rob Berryhill [SMTP:racefan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:20 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Charming wisps
>
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> Only some wisps do magical damage. I did just what you are suggesting one
> time, and the wisp I charmed did not have the magical attack, so the other
> wisp ate him for lunch!
>
> Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
> Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
>
> >
> > From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
> >
> > Just wondering if wisps do magical damage. I assume they do, but can
> you
> > charm a wisp to help you take
> > out other wisps?
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Azboklin the enchanter who will soon stop asking about level 12
> spells...
> > only 1.5 bubs of exp left to go and 40 plat to burn!
> >
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
